text: Kubesprawl happens when the cluster is the unit of deployment instead of the container - a lot less efficient and inevitably worse for the environment @holly_cummins giving an awesome keynote at #KubeCon

author.name: Hannah Foxwell
author.description: #HumanOps #HugOps #DevOps #DevSecOps #SRE Working at @snyksec Organiser of #DevOpsDays London and @OpenUK_UK ambassador (she/her)
